songs.title: Break the Silence
songs.album: A Collection of Rare and Unreleased Recordings
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
What gets me through this
What makes it worth is the hope for a better day
What you don't notice
What you lost focus on is I'm not the type to break

[Pre-Chorus]
Eight years of eggshell-caloused feet
Nine lives spent working on this dream
Six feet under, but breathing
One drink to celebrate my pain
Three drinks and I'm brand new again
One voice is all it takes
And I won't stop

[Chorus]
I take the heat, I feel the sting
Of another loss, and while I greive
I keep on trying cause it's just a matter of time
I see the light, even if it's fine
I won't bow down
I'm gonna show you 'til you see me
'Til you recognize this fire

[Verse 2]
What I am chasing
What I have faith in is that chance to test my wings
What you don't know is
What you lost focus on is I'm not going away

[Pre-Chorus]
Eight years of sitting on the bench
Nine lives spent tangled in your web
Six feet under, but breathing
One drink to celebrate my pain
Three drinks and I'm brand new again
One voice is all it takes
And I won't stop

[Chorus]
I take the heat, I feel the sting
Of another loss, and while I greive
I keep on trying cause it's just a matter of time
I see the light, even if it's fine
I won't bow down
I'm gonna show you 'til you see me
'Til you recognize this fire

[Bridge]
So you keep on keep on pushing
And I'll keep on fighting
You try and break me as I break the silence
Picking myself off the ground and saying
[?] don't puts on  dreams
This ain't what we're made to be
Trying so hard to make you see
I don't need your hands, I got my own
There's no fear because it's gone
I'm not gonna crawl around
I'm gonna stand [?] like I've always done

[Pre-Chorus]
Eight years of eggshell-caloused feet
Nine lives spent working on this dream
Six feet under, but breathing

[Chorus]
I take the heat, I feel the sting
Of another loss, and while I greive
I keep on trying cause it's just a matter of time
I see the light, even if it's fine
I won't bow down
I'm gonna show you 'til you see me
'Til you recognize this fire

[Outro]
So you keep on keep on pushing
And I'll keep on fighting
You try and break me as I break the silence
You keep on keep on pushing
And I'll keep on fighting
You try and break me as I break the silence
